machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!--
Step to configure OCR parameters

@Author: Alexey Shalak
@Version: 1.0
Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0
-->

<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config"
	scriptlang="groovy">
  
  	<required name="s3_bucket_name"/>
  	<required name="ocr_type"/>
  	<required name="cache_datastore"/>
  
  	<script><![CDATA[
		if(ocr_type.toString().equals("tood")) {
			export_format = "xmlForCorrectedImage";
		} else if (ocr_type.toString().equals("standard")) {
  			if( !sys.isVariableDefined("export_format") || export_format == null || export_format.toString().isEmpty()) {
				export_format = "xmlForCorrectedImage";
			} else {
				export_format = export_format.toString().replace("|", ",");
			}
		}
		sys.defineVariable("exportFormat", export_format);

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("document_language") || document_language == null || document_language.toString().isEmpty()) {
			document_language = "English";
		} else {
			document_language = document_language.toString().replace(" ", "");
		}
		sys.defineVariable("documentLanguage", document_language);

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("ocr_xml_char_recognition") || ocr_xml_char_recognition == null || ocr_xml_char_recognition.toString().isEmpty()) {
			ocr_xml_char_recognition = "false";
		}
		sys.defineVariable("ocrXmlCharRecognition", ocr_xml_char_recognition);

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("allowed_region_types") || allowed_region_types == null || allowed_region_types.toString().isEmpty()) {
			allowed_region_types = "BT_Table,BT_Text,BT_Separator,BT_SeparatorGroup,BT_Checkmark,BT_CheckmarkGroup,BT_AutoAnalysis";
		} else {
			allowed_region_types = allowed_region_types.toString().replace("|", ",");
		}
		sys.defineVariable("allowed_region_types", allowed_region_types)

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("custom_regions") || custom_regions == null) {
			custom_regions = "";
		}
		sys.defineVariable("custom_regions", custom_regions);

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("change_dpi") || change_dpi == null) {
			change_dpi = "";
		}	
 		sys.defineVariable("change_dpi", change_dpi);

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("invert_image") || invert_image == null || invert_image.toString().isEmpty()) {
			invert_image = "false";
		}
		sys.defineVariable("invertImage", invert_image)

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("discard_color_image") || discard_color_image == null || discard_color_image.toString().isEmpty()) {
			discard_color_image = "false";
		}
		sys.defineVariable("discardColorImage", discard_color_image);
		
		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("remove_color_objects") || remove_color_objects == null) {
			remove_color_objects = "";
		}	
 		sys.defineVariable("remove_color_objects", remove_color_objects);

		if( !sys.isVariableDefined("remove_color_objects_type") || remove_color_objects_type == null || remove_color_objects_type.toString().isEmpty()) {
			remove_color_objects_type = "Background";
		}
		sys.defineVariable("removeColorObjectsType", remove_color_objects_type);
	]]></script>
  
	<var-def name="document_uuid">
		<script language="java" return="uuid"><![CDATA[
			String uuid = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
		]]></script>
	</var-def>
  
  	<var-def name="bp_run_id">
		<template>
			${item.getWrappedObject().getRun().getRootRunUuid()}
		</template>
	</var-def>
  
	<export include-original-data="true">
      	<single-column name="cache_datastore" value="${cache_datastore}"/>
    	<single-column name="export_format" value="${exportFormat}"/>
        <single-column name="document_language" value="${documentLanguage}"/>
        <single-column name="ocr_xml_char_recognition" value="${ocrXmlCharRecognition}"/>
      	<single-column name="allowed_region_types" value="${allowed_region_types}"/>
      	<single-column name="custom_regions" value="${custom_regions}"/>
      	<single-column name="change_dpi" value="${change_dpi}"/>
        <single-column name="invert_image" value="${invertImage}"/>
        <single-column name="discard_color_image" value="${discardColorImage}"/>
      	<single-column name="remove_color_objects" value="${remove_color_objects}"/>
      	<single-column name="remove_color_objects_type" value="${removeColorObjectsType}"/>
      
      	<single-column name="bp_run_id" value="${bp_run_id}"/>
      	<single-column name="document_uuid" value="${document_uuid}"/>
	</export>
</config>
machineConfig.name: Input data processing

campaign.description: OCR XML with variants to viewable XML

machineConfig.name: [TOOD] XSLT XML Enrichment with WORD and DIV tags

campaign.title: [TOOD] XSLT XML Enrichment with WORD and DIV tags

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!--
Step to split document into PNG pages. Then we get json of pages urls for used it in "[TOOD} XSLT XML Enrichment with WORD and DIV tags" step.

@Author: Alexey Shalak
@Version: 1.0
Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0
-->

<config charset="UTF-8">

  	<required name="original_document_url"/>
	
    <var-def name="document_link">
     	 <template>${original_document_url.toString()}</template>
    </var-def> 
  
  	<var-def name="convert_lib_path">
  		<var-global name="convert_lib_path"/>
  	</var-def>
  
	<var-def name="fileList">
		<script return="convert(document_link.toString())"><![CDATA[
			import java.io.BufferedReader;
			import java.io.File;
			import java.io.IOException;
			import java.io.InputStreamReader;
			import java.net.URL;
			import com.itextpdf.text.Image;

			import com.google.common.io.Files;
			import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
			import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
			import com.freedomoss.workfusion.utils.gson.GsonUtils;
			import org.webharvest.runtime.variables.ListVariable;
			import org.webharvest.runtime.variables.Variable;

			static Integer counter;
			static File outputFolder;
			static Integer size;
			static ListVariable lv;

			static int getSize(){
				return size;
			}

   			static Variable staticGetVariable(Object i){
				return lv.get((Integer)i);
			}

			static boolean getOS(){
				return ((String)System.getProperties().get("os.name")).contains("Windows");
			}

			boolean isWindows=getOS();


			static ListVariable convert(String documentLink) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
				File baseDir = Files.createTempDir();

				File inputFolder = new File(baseDir, "input");

				URL documentUrl = new URL(documentLink);
				String inputFileName = FilenameUtils.getName(documentUrl.getPath());

				if (inputFileName == null || inputFileName.isEmpty()) {
					inputFileName = "input.pdf";
				}

				File inputFile = new File(inputFolder, inputFileName);
				FileUtils.copyURLToFile(documentUrl, inputFile);

				outputFolder = new File(baseDir, "output");
				FileUtils.forceMkdir(outputFolder);

				File result = new File(outputFolder, "output.png");
				File resultTiff = new File(outputFolder, "output.tiff");

				if (isWindows){
				invoke(new ProcessBuilder(new String[] {
					"magick",
					"convert",
					"-density","288",
					inputFile.getAbsolutePath(),
					// "-resize", "25%",
					result.getAbsolutePath()}
				));
				} else {
				invoke(new ProcessBuilder(new String[] {
					convert_lib_path.toString(),
					"-density","288",
					inputFile.getAbsolutePath(),
					// "-resize", "25%",
					result.getAbsolutePath()}
				));
    			}

				List list=new ArrayList();
				counter=0;
				File created=new File(outputFolder, "output-"+counter.toString()+".png");
				while (created.exists()){
					counter++;
					list.add(created);
					created=new File(outputFolder, "output-"+counter.toString()+".png");
				}
				if (counter==0){
					created=new File(outputFolder, "output.png");
					if (created.exists()){
						File updated=new File(outputFolder, "output-0.png");
						created.renameTo(updated);
						counter++;
						list.add(updated);
					}
				}
				size=list.size();
				counter=0;
				lv=new ListVariable(list);
				return lv;
			}

			static void invoke(ProcessBuilder builder) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
				builder.redirectErrorStream(true);

				System.err.println(builder.command());
				Process process = builder.start();

				BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(process.getInputStream()));
				String line;
				while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
					System.out.println(line);
				}
				in.close();

				int code = process.waitFor();
				if (code != 0) {
					throw new RuntimeException("Failed to invoke process: " + builder.command() + ". Return code: " + code);
				}
			}
		]]></script>
	</var-def>
	
	<var-def name="numberOfPages">
		<script return="getSize()" />
	</var-def>

	<loop item="fileJavaObject" index="i" filter="unique">
		<list>
			<var name="fileList" />
		</list>
		<body>
			<log>
				<template>File: ${fileJavaObject}</template>
			</log>
			<var-def name="key">
				<script return="staticGetVariable(i.toInt()-1)"></script>
			</var-def>
			<var-def name="content-${i}">
		        <file path="${key}" type="binary"/>
			</var-def>
			<var-def name="content">
				<var name="content-${i}" />
			</var-def>

			<var-def name="converted_link-${i}">
        		<s3  bucket="${s3_bucket_name}">
         			<s3-put-public path="${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/page-${i}.png" content="${content}" content-type="image/png" content-disposition="inline"/>
        		</s3>
			</var-def>
		</body>
	</loop>
	
	<var-def name="jsonFilesUrls">
		<json>
			<loop item="fileJavaObject" index="i" filter="unique">
				<list>
					<var name="fileList" />
				</list>
				<body>
					<json-put key="fileList-${i}">
						<var name="converted_link-${i}" />
					</json-put>
				</body>
			</loop>
		</json>
	</var-def>
     
	<export include-original-data="true">
		<single-column name="pages" value="${numberOfPages}" />
		<single-column name="json_file_urls" value="${jsonFilesUrls}" />
	</export>
</config>
machineConfig.name: [TOOD] Split document into PNG pages

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Step to make request to the OCR api, with our input parameters , but before, get one OCR taskId for all pages of document and make valid OCR api URL.
@Author: Alexey Shalak @Version: 1.0 Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0 -->
<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config" scriptlang="java">
<!-- reading pNG from S3 --> <script><![CDATA[ import org.json.XML; import java.util.List; import java.util.ArrayList; import org.json.JSONObject; import org.json.JSONArray; import com.freedomoss.workfusion.utils.gson.GsonUtils;
static String getJSONValue(String jsonString, String key) { try{ JSONObject json = new JSONObject(jsonString); return json.get(key).get("directUrl").toString(); } catch (Exception e){ return ""; } } ]]></script>
<var-def name="jsonSize"> <var name="pages" /> </var-def>
<while condition="true" maxloops="${jsonSize.toInt()}" index="i"> <var-def name="jsonKey"> <template>fileList-${i.toInt()}</template> </var-def> <!-- reading pNG from S3 --> <var-def name="jsonValue-${i}"> <script return="getJSONValue(json_file_urls.toString(), jsonKey.toString())" /> </var-def> </while>
<var-def name="pagesList"> <while condition="true" maxloops="${jsonSize.toInt()}" index="i"> <var name="jsonValue-${i}" /> </while> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_url"> <var-global name="ocr_url"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_username"> <var-global name="ocr_username"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_password"> <var-global name="ocr_password"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="submitImage"> <case> <if condition='${ocr_username.toString().isEmpty() || ocr_password.toString().isEmpty()}'> <http url="${ocr_url}/submitImage" method="post" multipart="true"> <http-param name="file" isfile="true"> <http url="${original_document_url}" /> </http-param> </http> </if> <else> <http url="${ocr_url}/submitImage" method="post" multipart="true" username="${ocr_username.toString()}" password="${ocr_password.toString()}"> <http-param name="file" isfile="true"> <http url="${original_document_url}" /> </http-param> </http> </else> </case> </var-def>
<var-def name="taskId"> <xpath expression="string(//response/task/@id)"> <var name="submitImage" /> </xpath> </var-def>
<case> <if condition="${pagesList.toList().size() > 1}"> <loop item="pagesListElement"> <list> <var name="pagesList" /> </list> <body> <http url="${ocr_url}/submitImage" method="post" multipart="true"> <http-param name="file" isfile="true"> <http url="${pagesListElement}" /> </http-param> <http-param name="taskId" isfile="${taskId}" /> </http> </body> </loop> </if> </case>
<script><![CDATA[ //-------------------------------------------------------making processDocument url------------------------------------------------------- String url = ocr_url.toString() + "/processDocument?taskId=" + taskId.toString() + "&exportFormat=" + no_cached_export_format.toString() + "&language=" + document_language.toString() + "&xml:writeRecognitionVariants=" + ocr_xml_char_recognition.toString() + "&correctSkew=true&correctOrientation=true&allowedRegionTypes=" + allowed_region_types.toString() + "&invertImage=" + invert_image.toString() + "&discardColorImage=" + discard_color_image.toString() + "&removeColorObjectsType=" + remove_color_objects_type.toString(); StringBuilder process_document_url = new StringBuilder(url.toString());
if( !custom_regions.toString().isEmpty()) { process_document_url.append("&customRegions=" + custom_regions.toString()); }
if( !change_dpi.toString().isEmpty()) { process_document_url.append("&changeDPI=" + change_dpi.toString()); }
if( !remove_color_objects.toString().isEmpty()) { process_document_url.append("&removeColorObjects=" + remove_color_objects.toString()); } sys.defineVariable("processDocumentUrl", process_document_url) ]]></script>
<var-def name="processDocument"> <case> <if condition='${ocr_username.toString().isEmpty() || ocr_password.toString().isEmpty()}'> <http url="${processDocumentUrl.toString()}" method="get" /> </if> <else> <http url="${processDocumentUrl.toString()}" method="get" username="${ocr_username.toString()}" password="${ocr_password.toString()}" /> </else> </case> </var-def>
<export include-original-data="true"> <single-column name="ocr_task_id" value="${taskId}"/> </export> </config>
machineConfig.name: [TOOD] OCR

businessRule.name: OCR Router

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Step to get response from OCR api, and if OCR Process is "Completed", get OCRed document for each OCR export format parameter, put them on S3 and create OCR JSON with result OCR information.
@Author: Alexey Shalak @Author: Denis Uraev @Version: 1.1 Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0 -->
<config charset="UTF-8">
<var-def name="ocr_url"> <var-global name="ocr_url"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_username"> <var-global name="ocr_username"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_password"> <var-global name="ocr_password"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_failed"> false </var-def>
<var-def name="xml_export_format_flag"> false </var-def>
<var-def name="statusResponse"> <case> <if condition='${ocr_username.toString().isEmpty() || ocr_password.toString().isEmpty()}'> <http url="${ocr_url.toString()}/getTaskStatus?taskId=${ocr_task_id.toString()}" method="get" /> </if> <else> <http url="${ocr_url.toString()}/getTaskStatus?taskId=${ocr_task_id.toString()}" method="get" username="${ocr_username.toString()}" password="${ocr_password.toString()}" /> </else> </case> </var-def> <log><template>${statusResponse}</template></log> <var-def name="taskStatus"> <xpath expression="string(//response/task/@status)"> <var name="statusResponse" /> </xpath> </var-def>
<case> <!-- <if condition='${!"Completed".equals(taskStatus.toString()) @and !"ProcessingFailed".equals(taskStatus.toString())}'> <release time-in-seconds="30" /> <exit /> </if>-->
<if condition='${"ProcessingFailed".equals(taskStatus.toString())}'> <script><![CDATA[ sys.defineVariable("ocr_failed", true); sys.defineVariable("ocr_failed_response", statusResponse); ]]></script> </if>
<if condition='${"Completed".equals(taskStatus.toString())}'>
<script language="groovy"><![CDATA[ import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;
List export_format_list = Arrays.asList(no_cached_export_format.toString().split(",")); sys.defineVariable("export_format_list", export_format_list);
List<Map> ocr_result_list = new ArrayList(); sys.defineVariable("ocr_result_list", ocr_result_list);
def original_document_url_object = new java.net.URI(original_document_url.toString()) def original_document_name = original_document_url_object.getPath().tokenize('/').last().tokenize('.').first()
sys.defineVariable("original_document_name", original_document_name); ]]></script>
<loop item="format"> <list> <var name="export_format_list" /> </list> <body> <case> <if condition='${export_format_list.toList().indexOf(format) == 0}'> <var-def name="result_url"> <xpath expression="string(//response/task/@resultUrl)"> <var name="statusResponse" /> </xpath> </var-def> </if>
<if condition='${export_format_list.toList().indexOf(format) == 1}'> <var-def name="result_url"> <xpath expression="string(//response/task/@resultUrl2)"> <var name="statusResponse" /> </xpath> </var-def> </if>
<if condition='${export_format_list.toList().indexOf(format) == 2}'> <var-def name="result_url"> <xpath expression="string(//response/task/@resultUrl3)"> <var name="statusResponse" /> </xpath> </var-def> </if> </case>
<case> <if condition='${export_format_list.toList().indexOf(format) @lt 3}'> <var-def name="result"> <http url="${result_url}" charset="UTF-8" /> </var-def>
<case> <if condition='${format.toString().equals("html")}'> <var-def name="path"> <template>${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${original_document_name}-html.html</template> </var-def>
<var-def name="type"> <template>text/html</template> </var-def> </if> <if condition='${format.toString().equals("pdfSearchable")}'> <var-def name="path"> <template>${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${original_document_name}-pdf.pdf</template> </var-def>
<var-def name="type"> <template>application/pdf</template> </var-def> </if> <if condition='${format.toString().equals("xml")}'> <var-def name="xml_export_format_flag"> <script return="flag"><![CDATA[ String flag = "true"; ]]></script> </var-def>
<var-def name="result"> <script return="res"><![CDATA[ // Removing BOM String res = result.toString().replaceAll("^\uFEFF", ""); ]]></script> </var-def>
<var-def name="path"> <template>${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${original_document_name}-xml.xml</template> </var-def>
<var-def name="type"> <template>text/xml</template> </var-def> </if> <if condition='${format.toString().equals("xmlForCorrectedImage")}'> <var-def name="xml_export_format_flag"> <script return="flag"><![CDATA[ String flag = "true"; ]]></script> </var-def>
<var-def name="result"> <script return="res"><![CDATA[ // Removing BOM String res = result.toString().replaceAll("^\uFEFF", ""); ]]></script> </var-def>
<var-def name="path"> <template>${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${original_document_name}-xmlForCorrectedImage.xml</template> </var-def>
<var-def name="type"> <template>text/xml</template> </var-def> </if> <if condition='${format.toString().equals("txt")}'> <var-def name="path"> <template>${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${original_document_name}-txt.txt</template> </var-def>
<var-def name="type"> <template>text/plain</template> </var-def> </if> </case>
<var-def name="ocr_document_url"> <s3 bucket="${s3_bucket_name}"> <s3-put-public path="${path}" content="${result}" content-type="${type}" content-disposition="inline" /> </s3> </var-def>
<script language="groovy"><![CDATA[ def ocr_document_name = ocr_document_url.toString().tokenize('/').last().tokenize('.').first()
Map map = new HashMap();
map.put("original_document_url", original_document_url.toString()); map.put("original_document_name", original_document_name.toString()); map.put("ocr_document_url", ocr_document_url.toString()); map.put("ocr_document_name", ocr_document_name); map.put("ocr_export_format", format.toString()); map.put("ocr_document_format", path.toString().substring(path.toString().lastIndexOf(".") + 1, path.toString().length()));
ocr_result_list.toList().add(map); ]]></script> </if> </case>
</body> </loop>
<script language="groovy"><![CDATA[ import com.google.gson.Gson;
Gson gson = new Gson(); String result_json = gson.toJson(ocr_result_list.toList()); sys.defineVariable("ocr_json", result_json); ]]></script> </if> </case>
<export include-original-data="true"> <single-column name="xml_export_format_flag" value="${xml_export_format_flag}" /> <single-column name="ocr_failed" value="${ocr_failed}" /> <single-column name="ocr_failed_response" value="${ocr_failed_response}" /> <single-column name="ocr_json" value="${ocr_json}" /> </export> </config>
machineConfig.name: Response from OCR

businessRule.name: OCR Type

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Step to make row processing for all OCR result documents with "xml" format from previous step, also put updated documents on S3 and update OCR JSON.
@Author: Alexey Shalak @Author: Denis Uraev @Version: 1.2 Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0 -->
<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config" scriptlang="groovy">
<script><![CDATA[ import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;
List<Map> ocr_result_list = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ocr_json.toString()); sys.defineVariable("ocr_result_list", ocr_result_list);
List<Map> update_ocr_result_list = new ArrayList(); sys.defineVariable("update_ocr_result_list", update_ocr_result_list); ]]></script>
<loop item="map"> <list> <var name="ocr_result_list" /> </list> <body> <script><![CDATA[ sys.defineVariable("ocr_document_name", map.getWrappedObject().get("ocr_document_name").toString()); sys.defineVariable("ocr_export_format", map.getWrappedObject().get("ocr_export_format").toString()); sys.defineVariable("ocr_document_format", map.getWrappedObject().get("ocr_document_format").toString()); ]]></script> <case> <if condition='${ocr_document_format.toString().equals("xml")}'> <s3 bucket="${s3_bucket_name}"> <var-def name="xml_text"> <s3-get name="${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${ocr_document_name}.${ocr_document_format}" /> </var-def> </s3>
<var-def name="ocr_raw_processed_document"> <xslt> <xml> <var name="xml_text" /> </xml> <stylesheet><![CDATA[ <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:wfocr="http://ocr.crowdcomputingsystems.com/xml/schema-v1.xml" xmlns:csl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="wfocr:charRecVariants" /> <xsl:template match="wfocr:*/@serifProbability" /> <xsl:template match="wfocr:*/@wordFromDictionary" /> <xsl:template match="wfocr:*/@wordPenalty" /> <xsl:template match="wfocr:*/@wordNumeric" /> <xsl:template match="wfocr:*/@wordNormal" /> <xsl:template match="wfocr:*/@wordIdentifier" /> </xsl:stylesheet> ]]></stylesheet> </xslt> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_raw_processed_document_url"> <s3 bucket="${s3_bucket_name}"> <s3-put-public path="${bp_run_id}/${document_uuid}/${ocr_document_name}-raw_processed.${ocr_document_format}" content="${ocr_raw_processed_document}" content-type="text/html; charset=utf-8" content-disposition="inline" /> </s3> </var-def>
<script><![CDATA[ map.getWrappedObject().put("ocr_raw_processed_document_url", ocr_raw_processed_document_url.toString()); map.getWrappedObject().put("ocr_raw_processed_document_name", ocr_raw_processed_document_url.toString().substring(ocr_raw_processed_document_url.toString().lastIndexOf("/") + 1, ocr_raw_processed_document_url.toString().lastIndexOf("."))); ]]></script> </if> </case>
<script><![CDATA[ update_ocr_result_list.toList().add(new HashMap(map.getWrappedObject())); ]]></script> </body> </loop>
<script><![CDATA[ import com.google.gson.Gson;
Gson gson = new Gson(); String result_json = gson.toJson(update_ocr_result_list.toList()); sys.defineVariable("ocr_json", result_json); ]]></script>
<export include-original-data="true"> <single-column name="ocr_json" value="${ocr_json}" /> </export> </config>

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Step to make request to the OCR api, with our input parameters , but before, get one OCR taskId for document and make valid OCR api URL.
@Author: Alexey Shalak @Version: 1.0 Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0 -->
<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config" scriptlang="groovy">
<var-def name="ocr_url"> <var-global name="ocr_url"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_username"> <var-global name="ocr_username"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="ocr_password"> <var-global name="ocr_password"/> </var-def>
<var-def name="submitImage"> <case> <if condition='${ocr_username.toString().isEmpty() || ocr_password.toString().isEmpty()}'> <http url="${ocr_url}/submitImage" method="post" multipart="true"> <http-param name="file" isfile="true"> <http url="${original_document_url}" /> </http-param> </http> </if> <else> <http url="${ocr_url}/submitImage" method="post" multipart="true" username="${ocr_username.toString()}" password="${ocr_password.toString()}"> <http-param name="file" isfile="true"> <http url="${original_document_url}" /> </http-param> </http> </else> </case> </var-def>
<var-def name="taskId"> <xpath expression="string(//response/task/@id)"> <var name="submitImage" /> </xpath> </var-def>
<script><![CDATA[ //-------------------------------------------------------making processDocument url------------------------------------------------------- String url = ocr_url.toString() + "/processDocument?taskId=" + taskId.toString() + "&exportFormat=" + no_cached_export_format.toString() + "&language=" + document_language.toString() + "&xml:writeRecognitionVariants=" + ocr_xml_char_recognition.toString() + "&correctSkew=true&correctOrientation=true&allowedRegionTypes=" + allowed_region_types.toString() + "&invertImage=" + invert_image.toString() + "&discardColorImage=" + discard_color_image.toString() + "&removeColorObjectsType=" + remove_color_objects_type.toString(); StringBuilder process_document_url = new StringBuilder(url.toString());
if( !custom_regions.toString().isEmpty()) { process_document_url.append("&customRegions=" + custom_regions.toString()); }
if( !change_dpi.toString().isEmpty()) { process_document_url.append("&changeDPI=" + change_dpi.toString()); }
if( !remove_color_objects.toString().isEmpty()) { process_document_url.append("&removeColorObjects=" + remove_color_objects.toString()); } sys.defineVariable("processDocumentUrl", process_document_url) ]]></script>
<var-def name="processDocument"> <case> <if condition='${ocr_username.toString().isEmpty() || ocr_password.toString().isEmpty()}'> <http url="${processDocumentUrl.toString()}" method="get" /> </if> <else> <http url="${processDocumentUrl.toString()}" method="get" username="${ocr_username.toString()}" password="${ocr_password.toString()}" /> </else> </case> </var-def>
<export include-original-data="true"> <single-column name="ocr_task_id" value="${taskId}"/> </export> </config>

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!--
Step to get OCR result JSON and update it for comfortable using after.

@Author: Alexey Shalak
@Version: 1.0
Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0
-->

<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config"
	scriptlang="groovy">

	<script><![CDATA[
		import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;

		List<Map> cached_ocr_result_list = new JsonSlurper().parseText(cached_ocr_json.toString());
		sys.defineVariable("cached_ocr_result_list", cached_ocr_result_list);
		
		List<Map> ocr_result_list = new ArrayList();
		if( sys.isVariableDefined("ocr_json")) {
			ocr_result_list = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ocr_json.toString());
		}
		sys.defineVariable("ocr_result_list", ocr_result_list);

		Map<String,Map<String, String>> update_ocr_result_map = new HashMap();
		sys.defineVariable("update_ocr_result_map", update_ocr_result_map);
	]]></script>
      
  	<loop item="map">
		<list>
			<var name="cached_ocr_result_list" />
		</list>
		<body>
			<script><![CDATA[
				String ocr_export_format = map.getWrappedObject().get("ocr_export_format").toString();
				
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("original_document_name");
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("ocr_document_name");
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("ocr_raw_processed_document_name");
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("ocr_tood_document_name");
				
				update_ocr_result_map.getWrappedObject().put(ocr_export_format, map.getWrappedObject());
			]]></script>
		</body>
	</loop>
  
	<loop item="map">
		<list>
			<var name="ocr_result_list" />
		</list>
		<body>
			<script><![CDATA[
				String ocr_export_format = map.getWrappedObject().get("ocr_export_format").toString();
				
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("original_document_name");
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("ocr_document_name");
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("ocr_raw_processed_document_name");
				map.getWrappedObject().remove("ocr_tood_document_name");
				
				update_ocr_result_map.getWrappedObject().put(ocr_export_format, map.getWrappedObject());
			]]></script>
		</body>
	</loop>

	<script><![CDATA[
		import com.google.gson.Gson;

		Gson gson = new Gson();
		String result_json = gson.toJson(update_ocr_result_map.getWrappedObject());
		sys.defineVariable("ocr_json", result_json);
	]]></script>

	<export include-original-data="true">
		<single-column name="ocr_json" value="${ocr_json}" />
	</export>
</config>
machineConfig.name: Result JSON processing

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<!--
Step to save all new OCR result JSON members into cache datastore.

@Author: Alexey Shalak
@Version: 1.0
Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0
-->

<config>
	<var-def name="key">
		<template>${document_hash}</template>
	</var-def>

	<script language="groovy"><![CDATA[
		import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;

		List<Map> ocr_result_list = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ocr_json.toString());
		sys.defineVariable("ocr_result_list", ocr_result_list);
	]]></script>

	<loop item="map">
		<list>
			<var name="ocr_result_list" />
		</list>
		<body>
			<script><![CDATA[
				Map originalData = new LinkedHashMap();
				originalData.put("key", key.toString());
				originalData.put("cached_at", javax.xml.bind.DatatypeConverter.printDateTime(Calendar.getInstance()));

				originalData.put("ocr_type", ocr_type.toString());
				originalData.put("export_format", map.getWrappedObject().get("ocr_export_format").toString());
				originalData.put("document_language", document_language.toString());
				originalData.put("ocr_xml_char_recognition", ocr_xml_char_recognition.toString());
				originalData.put("allowed_region_types", allowed_region_types.toString());
				originalData.put("custom_regions", custom_regions.toString());
				originalData.put("change_dpi", change_dpi.toString());
				originalData.put("invert_image", invert_image.toString());
				originalData.put("discard_color_image", discard_color_image.toString());
				originalData.put("remove_color_objects", remove_color_objects.toString());
				originalData.put("remove_color_objects_type", remove_color_objects_type.toString());

				originalData.put("ocr_json", new com.google.gson.Gson().toJson(map.getWrappedObject()));
			]]></script>

			<var-def name="originalDataJson">
				<script return="new com.google.gson.Gson().toJson(originalData)" />
			</var-def>

			<insert-datastore datastore-name="${cache_datastore}"
				json-value-map="${originalDataJson}" create="true" />

		</body>
	</loop>

	<export include-original-data="true">
	</export>
</config>
machineConfig.name: Cache OCR results

businessRule.name: Cache hit?

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- Step to look for OCR cache for each OCR export format by all input parameters, and if it full hits we go to last BP step, otherwise go to the OCR step.
@Author: Alexey Shalak @Version: 1.0 Workfusion 2018, RPA Express 2.0 -->
<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config" scriptlang="groovy">
<var-def name="document_link"> <template>${sys.getVar("original_document_url")}</template> </var-def>
<script><![CDATA[ isUnsuccessfulStatusCode = {statusCode -> return statusCode.toString().matches('^[45]\\d{2}')}; ]]></script>
<try> <body> <var-def name="document"> <http url="${document_link}" /> </var-def> </body> <catch> </catch> </try>
<case> <if condition="${isUnsuccessfulStatusCode(http.statusCode)}"> <try> <body> <var-def name="document_link"> <template>${org.apache.commons.httpclient.util.URIUtil.encodeQuery(document_link.toString())} </template> </var-def> <var-def name="document"> <http url="${document_link}" /> </var-def> </body> <catch> </catch> </try> </if> </case>
<case> <if condition="${isUnsuccessfulStatusCode(http.statusCode)}"> <script><![CDATA[ throw new RuntimeException("Failed to fetch url: " + document_link + " status code: " + http.statusCode); ]]></script> </if> </case>
<var-def name="document_hash"> <template>${sys.getVar("document_hash")}</template> </var-def> <case> <if condition="${document_hash.toString().length() == 0}"> <var-def name="document_hash"> <script return="org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils.md5Hex(document.toBinary())" /> </var-def> </if> </case>
<!-- If the datastore is missing --> <create-datastore name="${cache_datastore}"> <datastore-column name="key" /> <datastore-column name="ocr_type" /> <datastore-column name="export_format" /> <datastore-column name="document_language" /> <datastore-column name="ocr_xml_char_recognition" /> <datastore-column name="allowed_region_types" /> <datastore-column name="custom_regions" /> <datastore-column name="change_dpi" /> <datastore-column name="invert_image" /> <datastore-column name="discard_color_image" /> <datastore-column name="remove_color_objects" /> <datastore-column name="remove_color_objects_type" /> </create-datastore>
<script><![CDATA[ export_format_list = Arrays.asList(export_format.toString().split(",")); sys.defineVariable("exportFormatList", export_format_list);
no_cached_export_format_list = new ArrayList(export_format_list);
List ocr_result_list = new ArrayList(); sys.defineVariable("ocr_result_list", ocr_result_list); ]]></script>
<loop item="format"> <list> <var name="exportFormatList" /> </list> <body> <var-def name="cachedRecord"> <datastore name="${cache_datastore}" max="1"> <template> SELECT * FROM @this WHERE "key"='${document_hash}' AND "ocr_type"='${ocr_type}' AND "export_format"='${format}' AND "document_language"='${document_language}' AND "ocr_xml_char_recognition"='${ocr_xml_char_recognition}' AND "allowed_region_types"='${allowed_region_types}' AND "custom_regions"='${custom_regions}' AND "change_dpi"='${change_dpi}' AND "invert_image"='${invert_image}' AND "discard_color_image"='${discard_color_image}' AND "remove_color_objects"='${remove_color_objects}' AND "remove_color_objects_type"='${remove_color_objects_type}' </template> </datastore> </var-def>
<case> <if condition='${cachedRecord.toString().length() != 0}'> <var-def name="value"> <xpath expression='/row/ocr_json/text()'> <var name="cachedRecord"/> </xpath> </var-def>
<script><![CDATA[ no_cached_export_format_list.remove(format.toString());
ocr_result_list.toList().add(new HashMap(new groovy.json.JsonSlurper().parseText(value.toString()))); ]]></script> </if> </case> </body> </loop>
<script><![CDATA[ import com.google.gson.Gson;
String no_cached_export_format = no_cached_export_format_list.toString().replaceAll("[\\[\\]\\s]",""); sys.defineVariable("no_cached_export_format", no_cached_export_format);
Gson gson = new Gson(); String result_json = gson.toJson(ocr_result_list.toList()); sys.defineVariable("cached_ocr_json", result_json); ]]></script>
<export include-original-data="true"> <single-column name="document_hash" value="${document_hash}" /> <single-column name="no_cached_export_format" value="${no_cached_export_format}" /> <case> <if condition='${no_cached_export_format_list.size() == export_format_list.size()}'> <single-column name="cache_hit" value="none"/> </if> <if condition='${no_cached_export_format_list.size() == 0}'> <single-column name="cache_hit" value="full"/> <single-column name="ocr_failed" value="false"/> </if> <else> <single-column name="cache_hit" value="half"/> </else> </case> <single-column name="cached_ocr_json" value="${cached_ocr_json}" /> </export> </config>
machineConfig.name: Look for OCR cache

businessRule.name: OCR Type

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<config charset="UTF-8">

  	<required name="original_document_url"/>
	
    <var-def name="document_link">
     	 <template>${original_document_url}</template>
    </var-def>
  
  	<var-def name="name_of_page">
     	 page_for_manual_tagging
    </var-def>
  
  	<var-def name="desired_dpi">
     	 <template>288</template>
    </var-def>
  
  	<var-def name="convert_path">
     	 <template>${convert_lib_path}</template>
    </var-def>

    <var-def name="document_uuid">
         <script return="uuid"><![CDATA[String uuid = UUID.randomUUID().toString();]]> </script>
    </var-def>   
  
	<var-def name="fileList">
		<script return="convert(document_link.toString())"><![CDATA[
			import java.io.BufferedReader;
			import java.io.File;
			import java.io.IOException;
			import java.io.InputStreamReader;
			import java.net.URL;
			import com.itextpdf.text.Image;

			import com.google.common.io.Files;
			import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
			import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
			import com.freedomoss.workfusion.utils.gson.GsonUtils;
			import org.webharvest.runtime.variables.ListVariable;
			import org.webharvest.runtime.variables.Variable;

			static Integer counter;
			static File outputFolder;
			static Integer size;
			static ListVariable lv;

			static int getSize(){
				return size;
			}

   			static Variable staticGetVariable(Object i){
				return lv.get((Integer)i);
			}

			static boolean getOS(){
				return ((String)System.getProperties().get("os.name")).contains("Windows");
			}

			boolean isWindows=getOS();

			String dpi = desired_dpi.getWrappedObject().get(0).getWrappedObject().toString();
			String convert = convert_path.getWrappedObject().get(0).getWrappedObject().toString();


			static ListVariable convert(String documentLink) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
				File baseDir = Files.createTempDir();

				File inputFolder = new File(baseDir, "input");

				URL documentUrl = new URL(documentLink);
				String inputFileName = FilenameUtils.getName(documentUrl.getPath());
				if (inputFileName == null || inputFileName.isEmpty()) {
					inputFileName = "input.pdf";
				}

				File inputFile = new File(inputFolder, inputFileName);
				FileUtils.copyURLToFile(documentUrl, inputFile);

				outputFolder = new File(baseDir, "output");
				FileUtils.forceMkdir(outputFolder);

				File result = new File(outputFolder, "output.png");
				File resultTiff = new File(outputFolder, "output.tiff");

				if (isWindows){
				invoke(new ProcessBuilder(new String[] {
					"magick",
					"convert",
					"-density",dpi,
					"-depth","1",
					"-colorspace","Gray",
					inputFile.getAbsolutePath(),
					// "-resize", "25%",
					result.getAbsolutePath()}
				));
				} else {
				invoke(new ProcessBuilder(new String[] {
					convert,
					"-density",dpi,
					"-depth","1",
					"-colorspace","Gray",
					inputFile.getAbsolutePath(),
					// "-resize", "25%",
					result.getAbsolutePath()}
				));
    			}
				List list=new ArrayList();
				counter=0;
				File created=new File(outputFolder, "output-"+counter.toString()+".png");
				while (created.exists()){
					counter++;
					list.add(created);
					created=new File(outputFolder, "output-"+counter.toString()+".png");
				}
				if (counter==0){
					created=new File(outputFolder, "output.png");
					if (created.exists()){
						File updated=new File(outputFolder, "output-0.png");
						created.renameTo(updated);
						counter++;
						list.add(updated);
					}
				}
				size=list.size();
				counter=0;
				lv=new ListVariable(list);
				return lv;
			}

			static void invoke(ProcessBuilder builder) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
				builder.redirectErrorStream(true);

				System.err.println(builder.command());
				Process process = builder.start();

				BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(process.getInputStream()));
				String line;
				while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
					System.out.println(line);
				}
				in.close();

				int code = process.waitFor();
				if (code != 0) {
					throw new RuntimeException("Failed to invoke process: " + builder.command() + ". Return code: " + code);
				}
			}
		]]></script>
	</var-def>
	
	<var-def name="numberOfPages">
		<script return="getSize()" />
	</var-def>

	<loop item="fileJavaObject" index="i" filter="unique">
		<list>
			<var name="fileList" />
		</list>
		<body>
			<log>
				<template>File: ${fileJavaObject}</template>
			</log>
			<var-def name="key">
				<script return="staticGetVariable(i.toInt()-1)"></script>
			</var-def>
			<var-def name="content-${i}">
		        <file path="${key}" type="binary"/>
			</var-def>
			<var-def name="content">
				<var name="content-${i}" />
			</var-def>

			<var-def name="converted_link-${i}">
        		<s3  bucket="${s3_bucket_name}">
         			<s3-put-public path="${document_uuid}/${name_of_page}-${i}.png" content="${content}" content-type="image/png" content-disposition="inline"/>
        		</s3>
			</var-def>
		</body>
	</loop>
	
	<var-def name="jsonFilesUrls">
		<json>
			<loop item="fileJavaObject" index="i" filter="unique">
				<list>
					<var name="fileList" />
				</list>
				<body>
					<json-put key="fileList-${i}">
						<var name="converted_link-${i}" />
					</json-put>
				</body>
			</loop>
		</json>
	</var-def>
     
	<export include-original-data="true">
		<single-column name="json_file_urls_for_manual" value="${jsonFilesUrls}" />
	</export>
</config>
machineConfig.name: (Copy)[TOOD] Split PDF into PNG pages for manual task

<var-def name="exportType"> <case> <if condition='${sys.isVariableDefined("_sys_export_type")}'> <template>${_sys_export_type}</template> </if> </case> </var-def>

<var-def name="datastoreName"> <script return="item.getWrappedObject().getRun().getDatastoreName()" /> </var-def> <case> <if condition="${!datastoreName.isEmpty()}"> <insert-datastore datastore-name="${datastoreName}" create="true"> <script return="hit_submission_data_item.getWrappedObject().getItemValueMap()"/> </insert-datastore> </if> </case>
<export include-original-data="true" export-type="${exportType}" export-columns="${exportColumns}" column-name-case="${columnNameCase}" data-only="${dataOnly}"> </export> </config>
